channel.title: Endless Pures server + client!
channel.description:
Server download - http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?n5oddtkmumo Fixed client download -http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?mdvmmn0tmcn NEW CLIENT DL IS AT BOTTOM OF POST!
I have only posted this on RS, RL, and moparscape forums everywere else is leeched
Basic delta features but!!!!
I have done this -Forgot to mention, i also added a new mining zone with ess, and all ores that give exp -Made the ess so when you mine it, it gives noted ess. -Added BLACKMARKS system! -All NEW BARROWS(Kill them for points once you got all go into tunnel) -Fixed dds spec -Fixed duping glitch -Fixed void, (range and melee) -Added energy potion(not in shops...)adds energy works good! (normal energy potion) -Didn't add castle wars yet, buy fixed it up into training! -Changed up assault shop (Didn't fix the new assault npc yet...Won't give assault points lol) -Added real vengeance skulls (Veng yourself and other) -Fixed ags spec, hits more higher realistic... -Added a mage minigame gives mage exp (50k ea time atm) -Added skill guide menu's(When you click on Attack or anything else it will open up the requirements or so) -Added ::yell command and ::message for for admins -Fixed starter command, (You don't get the starter untill you type ::starter) -Added the ::command, for 50k exp in Attack, Strength, Hitpoints, Range, and Magic! -Fixed the fightcapes, sometimes makes you dc. -Added skillcape emotes(Didn't add the command yet or anything to activate it) -Made drops a little bit higher! -Fixed Rune c bow, its not a server were you keep hitting 10's, it has random hits, and hits good, and don't forget the random hit with new gfx. -Fixed god spells, not the max is 40 or 45, and It's a random hit not always 30 like before. -The new npc tank shoots fire like a tank! (Made the base of it a dragon with modifying like higher hits and stuff) -Before when you had protect on npc's they always hit 0's, made some npc's hit like max 15's or 9's..Not all
Things haven't finished -Teleport tablets (item 2968, you might see it in clickingmost or client.java but it doesn't work yet) -Dueling ring, and glory amulets
Things to look foward to in V2!! -Full Warriors guild (Just need to find the models!) -Might be castle wars! -Might be dueling arena! -More items -Might be a new quest -I really want to make a new minigame or something...Or an event
For more things to look foward to in V2 Please post your suggestions! I will try to fix/add them in the future!
Client- -Added items -Added new gfx's -2New npc's! (Tank added, and a another secret npc) Npc id's 3800, 3845 or so. -New prayer -Lunar -Not all items in class 8 work! -My godbows! but they a little glitched for some reason can't see in inventory only equipped, never felt like making it a bow or giving bonuses.........
Guys sorry i can't post pictures........
Please send me feedback and enjoy!
..::Credits::.. Jaden Delta Me I Duh Loot(Jon J) People who made tuts that i used..(Mostly from rs -.-) Galkon for some client features
!..::UPDATE::..! V2 updates - -Working teletabs -Fixed dds glitch hits instantly now! -Moved to a new client (much better :]) -added DClaws with spec, on players only........ -Added Keep items on death interface (ty RS) Only have to do server side :)
Server dl will be later not 2.0
NEW CLIENT DOWNLOAD! : http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?vdnmnad0wbt OLD client will not work with the newer server (not released yet)
New client creditz : Bluurr Ayton Me ( i converted it into my server, new interface,New items, added a few gfx's)
MINI TUT? If client doesn't work this is what you do You open up the file gui.java and scroll down a little or find "setserver" Then you might see the ip endlesspure.no-ip.org Change that to 0.0.0.0 so it connects to yourself :) GL

Btw d t 55, I wouln’t be talking, im not the one looking for coders lmfaoz, btw i know how to post pictures.[/quote]
